channel.title: course on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in course on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: supervisions and teaching
item.description: supervisions I am currently co-supervising - together with Olga Kuryatnikova and Wilco van den Heuvel - the PhD project of Marten Soer. The project sits at the intersection of Statistics and Operations Research, focusing on reducing computation via structural insights, applying advanced optimization methods, improving robustness to noise and unseen data, and enabling parameter constraints I am currently co-supervising - together with Pasquale Sarnacchiaro - the PhD project of Irene Ariante.
